biotools.summary: A tool for analyzing NGS datasets form pooled haploid mammalian cell screens. It is used to identify insertion locations in the whole genome, map them at the level of genes, and classify insertions according to their effects on gene function.

bioschemas.name: HaSAPPy
bioschemas.summary: A tool for analyzing NGS datasets form pooled haploid mammalian cell screens. It is used to identify insertion locations in the whole genome, map them at the level of genes, and classify insertions according to their effects on gene function.
